exhibitions.title: Inaugural Lines
exhibitions.description: A group presentation introducing gallerytwentythree's inaugural artist cohort.
exhibitions.body: Inaugural Lines brings together five contemporary artists whose practices explore the boundaries between traditional and digital media.

exhibitions.title: Echo Forms
exhibitions.description: Material studies in rhythm, edge, and reflection.
exhibitions.body: Echo Forms presents new work by Mira Chen, exploring the intersection of sound and sculptural form.

exhibitions.title: Future Territories
exhibitions.description: Speculative visions of place and belonging in digital space.
exhibitions.body: Future Territories examines how digital technologies reshape our understanding of community and place.

artists.name: Mira Chen
artists.bio: Working across sculpture and sound, Mira Chen explores resonance and form through material studies.

artists.name: Alex Rivera
artists.bio: Alex Rivera creates immersive digital environments that interrogate space, identity, and technology.
